root.ad_description_caracts: <0> Type: Cabin Cruisers </0><1>Sales status:available</1><2>Manufacturer:Beneteau </2><3>Model:Antares 30</3><4>Model:Antares 30 </4><5>Mooring Country:United Kingdom</5><6>Year built: 2011 </6><7>Flag:Guernsey</7><8>Length:10.00 m/33 ft </8><9>Width:3 m/10 ft</9><10>Draft:1 m/3 ft </10><11>Weight dry:5700</11><12>First launch:2011 </12><13>No. of previous owners:1</13><14>Condition:as new </14><15>Sale Type:Used</15><16>Sale:Private </16><17>Sale:Private</17><18>Propulsion:Inboard </18><19>Engine manufacturer:Volvo</19><20>Engine manufacturer: Volvo</20><21>No. of engines:1</21><22>Engine hours: 250</22><23>HP:370</23><24>Fuel Capacity: 400 </24><25>Material hull:GRP</25><26>Material deck:GRP </26><27>Fresh water capacity:120</27><28>Holding tank capacity: 80</28><29>No. of cabins:3</29><30>No. of berths: 6</30><31>Headroom:2 m/7 ft</31><32>1 </32><33>Displacement:1 metre</33><34>Deck Colour:White </34><35>Deck Const.:GRP</35><36>Hull Colour:Dark Blue </36><37>Hull Const.:GRP</37><38>Super Colour:White </38><39>Super Const.:GRP</39>
